org.activebpel.rt.war.tags
Interface IAeErrorAwareBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractAdminBean
public interface IAeErrorAwareBean

Interface for tags to report errors when setting properties on beans. The likely cause of these errors would be data entry errors by the user in a web form. This allows the bean to be aware of the error and provide details of the error on the page as opposed to a JspException.

Method Summary
 void addError(java.lang.String aPropertyName, java.lang.String aValue, java.lang.String aErrorMessage)
          Called by the custom tag when it couldn't set a property on the bean.
 java.lang.String getErrorValue(java.lang.String aPropertyName)
          Returns a value that was added previously by a call to addError.
 

Method Detail

addError

public void addError(java.lang.String aPropertyName,
                     java.lang.String aValue,
                     java.lang.String aErrorMessage)
Called by the custom tag when it couldn't set a property on the bean.

Parameters:
aPropertyName - The name of the property.
aValue - The value of the property that caused the problem.
aErrorMessage - The error message.

getErrorValue

public java.lang.String getErrorValue(java.lang.String aPropertyName)
Returns a value that was added previously by a call to addError. If present, this value represents a failed attempt to set a value on a bean due to an invalid format or some other runtime parsing error. This method allows tags to display the offending value in place of a null or default value. i.e. If a user enters an invalid date format, then the SetDate tag will catch the error and report it on the bean. There will likely be a form field on the JSP which displays the date for the bean. The DateFormatter tag should check the bean to see if it's an instanceof IAeErrorAwareBean, and if it is, it will check to see if there is an error value for that property. If there is, it will display the error value. If not, it will display the formatted value for the bean's property.

Parameters:
aPropertyName -
